All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AsyncRenderingComponent
Defines a base class for Swing components drawn in the background.
AsyncRenderingComponent.PaintHook<T>
Instances of this interface can be passed to the setRenderingArgs method and the methods of this interface will be called prior to and after rendering.
BasicRenderingArguments
Holds arguments usually required to render a Swing component.
BasicTransformationModel
Defines a container for basic image transformations and for the zoom to fit transformation.
BasicTransformationProperty
Defines a convenient class for viewing the properties of a BasicTransformationModel as MutableProperty instances.
BasicTransformedImageDisplay<ImageAddress>
Defines a Swing component which is able to display an image, applying a series of user defined transformations and convenience methods to apply basic image transformations.
DrawingConnector<ResultType>
A helper class for triple buffering when rendering to a BufferedImage.
Graphics2DComponent
Defines a convenient base class for user drawn Swing components.
GraphicsCopyResult<ResultType>
Defines the result of a copying to a Graphics object.
ImageRenderer<DataType,ResultType>
Defines a rendering tasks which draws its result to a BufferedImage.
RenderingResult<ResultType>
Defines the result of a rendering done by an ImageRenderer.
RenderingType
Defines the possible outcomes of rendering method calls.
TransformationAdapter
A convenient base class for TransformationListener implementations.
TransformationListener
The interface to listen for changes in the transformation applied to an image.
TransformationStepDef
Defines a single transformation step of TransformedImageDisplay.
TransformationStepPos
Defines a reference which might be used to add a new transformation step before or after a TransformationStepDef.
TransformedImageDisplay<ImageAddress>
Defines a Swing component which is able to display an image applying a series of user defined transformations.
